body.p: on this day came personally before me the undersigned Justice of the Peace for said County Wm White who being of Lawful age and duly sworn states that he is acquainted with P. E. Kelly, he further states that on or about the 11th day of July 1861 said Kelly told him that he was going South to Join the Southern Army, and also on the next Rob't Dunn told this affiant that Kelly had gone thither
Subscribed & Sworn to before me this 22nd day of July 1861
J. M. Stephens J. P. J. C.
